benchmark_details.name: Advice Identification Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: We present a dataset in English from two Reddit advice forums – r/AskParents and r/needadvice – annotated for whether sentences in posts contain advice or not.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: This work aims to advance both our understanding of how people give advice, as well as to provide resources for learning to identify advice.

data.source: Data collected from Reddit advice forums r/AskParents and r/needadvice.
data.annotation: Crowdsourced advice annotations from Amazon Mechanical Turk, with DAWID-SKENE aggregated labels.

methodology.calculation: Standard metrics for evaluating binary classification.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate how well sentences were classified as advice or not.
methodology.baseline_results: Rule-based models offered as baselines; BERT-based models performed comparably.
methodology.validation: Validated using expert annotations and DAWID-SKENE labels.
